name: Galactic Go Space Shooter
description:
Galactic Go is a simple to play arcade space shooter that utilises the tilt function.
The goal is to score as many points as possible by shooting enemy ships and surviving, as the time progresses the level gets harder.Players are able to gain coins in game to buy power-ups as well as other ships to help boost their scores.

If you prefer download from the play store : https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.JackInABox.GalaticGoNew
